Name: Perish Song
About the game: The King is Dead. The world was left without a leader until seven powerful warriors divided the land amongst themselves. These fateful seven ruled their respective lands with an iron fist. All hope was seemingly lost until one day a hero arrived. Could this hero be the one to defeat the seven and uncover the secrets left behind by the former king? Gameplay Perish Song is a 2D action rogue-lite. Traverse through different environments as you battle unique enemies and bosses. Discover the secrets of the world as you dash and blast through anything standing in your path. Each death is an opportunity to learn, adapt, and overcome. Main Features 100+ Unique Levels 30+ Exciting Enemies 7+ Explosive Bosses 6 Upgradable Skills to fit your play style 10 Collectable Companions to aid you in battle Other Features Engaging Story Upgradable abilities that help turn the tides in battle Challenging but fair combat. Most enemies have weaknesses/blind spots that can be exploited Steam achievements Both of my cats If you made it this far, I appreciate it.
